hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:Um Sulaim said (to the Prophet), "Anas is your servant; so please invoke for Allah's blessings for him." He said "O Allah! Increase his wealth and offspring, and Bless (for him) whatever You give him

chapter.ara-name: باب الدُّعَاءِ بِكَثْرَةِ الوَلَدِ مَعَ الْبَرَكَةِ
chapter.eng-name: To invoke for increase of offspring, along with His Blessings.
